Main
================================================================================

Jarrod J. Scott {#title}
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

### an old-school naturalist using new-school tech

I study the organiztion of microbial diversity. I do my best to take a holistic approach to build & see the bigger picture. My work is systems agnostic, meaning my studies span ecosystems, from the forest floor to the ocean floor. I try to make my science  accessible & exciting, transparent & reproducible. I use open-source tools to build web products that communicate  my science.
